LanguageData.SS_normalSpeedTooltip: Multiplier for normal speed. Default is 1, which translates to 60 ticks per second.
LanguageData.SS_fastSpeedTooltip: Multiplier for fast speed. Default is 3, which translates to 180 ticks per second.
LanguageData.SS_superfastSpeedTooltip: Multiplier for superfast speed. Default is 6, which translates to 360 ticks per second.
LanguageData.SS_ultrafastSpeedTooltip: Multiplier for ultrafast speed. Default is 15, which translates to 900 ticks per second. Bear in mind this isn't magic. If your PC can handle 8000 ticks per second, it will. If not, it will be capped.
